definitions.text: skillful at eluding capture; - David Kline
examples: a cabal of conspirators, each more elusive than the archterrorist

definitions.text: difficult to detect or grasp by the mind or analyze
examples: his whole attitude had undergone a subtle change

definitions.text: making great mental demands; hard to comprehend or solve or believe
examples: I faced the knotty problem of what to have for breakfast
